title: Bug 121687Exception throws when export data in table which inside a grid cell.
description: Description:Exception throws when export data in table which inside a grid cell.Steps to reproduce:1. insert a grid.2. insert one table to one grid cell.3. insert another table to the other grid cell.4. export data in two tables.Expected result:Data are exported.Actual result:Exception in:ReportEngineService.getMetaData( )
